document_data.name: Cora Peytir
document_data.titles: Blade{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|8}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Cora Peytir''' was one of the [[Blade (disambiguation)|Blades]] of [[Mulmaster]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to her duties as a Blade, Cora managed her family business of lumberyards and mills.
document_data.History: Around [[1491 DR]], a series of strange quakes damaged only [[House Peytir]]'s holdings, so she hired some adventurers to investigate the matter.
document_data.Personality: Cora knew that her hold on power was tenuous at best, but she enjoyed her position and the attention she received. Cora easily saw through raw flattery, but could sometimes overlook the agenda of those who were exceedingly deferential to her status as a Blade. She always conducted reasoned negotiations but did not shy away from threats of financial ruin or implied violence.
